title: Percentage Calculator
description: Calculate percentages, percentage change, and percentage difference
metaDescription: Free Percentage Calculator - Calculate percentages, percentage change, and percentage difference. Solve what is X% of Y, X is what % of Y, and more.

percentageChange.title: Percentage Change from X to Y

percentageDifference.title: Percentage Difference between X and Y

info.title: About Percentage Calculator
info.description: Percentages are a way to express a number as a fraction of 100. This calculator helps you solve various percentage problems including finding percentages, calculating percentage change, and determining percentage differences.
info.use3: Analyze financial changes and growth rates
